basic.description: Students will perform in a public recital in accordance with the guidelines established by the School of Music.
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: Applied Study I (Performance Recital)

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     BMUS students only.
COREQUISITE    MUSC 120/6.0.
EXCLUSION    No more than 6.0 units from MUSC 121/6.0; MUSC 125/6.0.
